content: remembrance day poppy designer wendy van leeuwen @mycrochetteacher step-by-step tutorial video at https //www youtube com/watch v=9xamx95zfki questions mycrochetteacher@gmail com difficulty level 2 intermediate abbreviations yarn worsted weight yarn - 5 yards red and 1 chain - chain yard black single_crochet - single_crochet 4 mm crochet hook st s - stitch es size measures approximately 2 ¼ across slip_stitch - slip_stitch half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet instructions with black yarn chain 4 join with slip_stitch to first chain round 1 single_crochet in the ring chain 1 work 11 half_double_crochet in the ring cut yarn pull through and finish by pulling the end under the two loops of the first half_double_crochet and back into the centre of the st it came out of see video round 2 join red to any st chain 1 work 2 half_double_crochet in the same st work 2 half_double_crochet in the next st single_crochet in the next st *work 2 half_double_crochet in each of the next two sts then single_crochet in the next st repeat from * twice take your hook out of the loop and insert it back to front through the top of the first half_double_crochet in the round pick up the loop again and pull it through to the back 20 sts round 3 single_crochet half_double_crochet in the same stitch as join * work 2 half_double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts take your hook out of the loop and insert it back to front through the top of the next st should be the single_crochet from the row below ** single_crochet half_double_crochet in the next st repeat from * twice and from * to ** once cut the yarn pull through the last loop and sew in ends
